name: minimal-hapi-react-webpack-hmr-sandbox
description: Minimal Hapi + React + Webpack + HMR (hot module reloading) Sandbox
author: Nikita Gazarov <nikita@raquo.com>

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production     node --harmony src/scripts/make.js  &&  NODE_ENV=production   webpack -p --config src/config/webpack-config.js
scripts.webpack: NODE_ENV=development  node --harmony src/scripts/make.js  &&  NODE_ENV=development  node --harmony src/webpackDevServer.js
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development      node --harmony src/scripts/make.js  &&  NODE_ENV=development  nodemon --harmony src/server.js
